comment: The definition of projector ordering in [Halmos] p. 42 is equivalent to the definition of projector ordering in [Beran] p. 110. (We will usually express projector ordering with the even simpler equivalent ` G C_ H ` ; see ~ pjssposi ). (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
